GeoVid is a well known company, specializing on multimedia software for Windows OS. We recognize constantly increasing interest to our products and only during the past year we have developed some new programs with new features and expanded functionality of our old well-known products.

So now the list of our products, made for the increasing demand on software with wide functions of editing, converting and splitting video files, suggest a tool for practically any need.

Our programs allow you to:

  • Crop useless frames and parts of frames.

  • Change width, high and codec properties of your video.

  • Add watermarks, logos and any copyright messages to your video.

  • Transform Microsoft PowerPoint Presentation into any video format: AVI, ASF, WMV, MPEG, VOB and MP4.

  • Edit resolution, duration, framerate, video and audio quality of your video.

  • Convert video files to animation GIF formats.

  • Extract audio soundtracks from video AVI, ASF, WMV files.

  • Create SWF Flash slideshow.

  • Record screen video.

  • Split large AVI, mpeg, WMV, ASF files into smaller video clips in various formats.
